mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `statistics`(`year`,`month`,`withdrawCash`,`rechargeCash`,`serviceMoney`,`advertisementMoney`,`businessCount`) VALUE( YEAR(NOW()), MONTH(NOW()), (SELECT -SUM(recordInAndOut) FROM `Goldnotes` WHERE YEAR(recordDate)=YEAR(NOW()) AND acquisitionMode =8 AND MONTH(recordDate) = MONTH(NOW())), (SELECT SUM(recordInAndOut) FROM Goldnotes WHERE YEAR(recordDate)=YEAR(NOW()) AND acquisitionMode =5 OR acquisitionMode=6 AND MONTH(recordDate)=MONTH(NOW())), (SELECT SUM(smallPlan)*0.1 FROM orders WHERE YEAR(orderTime)=YEAR(NOW()) AND orderStatus!=1 AND MONTH(orderTime) = MONTH(NOW())), 0, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `user` WHERE merchantType != 0 AND MONTH(merchantRegistrationTime) = MONTH(NOW()) AND YEAR(merchantRegistrationTime)= YEAR(NOW())) )
mapper.select:
SELECT (`rechargeCash`-`withdrawCash`) as sum,`statisticsId`,`year`,`month`,SUM(`withdrawCash`) as withdrawCash,SUM(`rechargeCash`) as rechargeCash,SUM(`serviceMoney`) as serviceMoney,SUM(`advertisementMoney`) as advertisementMoney,SUM(`businessCount`) as businessCount FROM `statistics`
and `year` = #{year}
GROUP BY
year
month
ORDER BY `statisticsId`
